medium: Daguerreotype (quarter plate), leather, metal, velvet, glass
title: Ellsworth Eliot, New York City
description: Man wearing white shirt, bowtie, jacket and vest with beard, resting his PR arm on a table and PL hand in lap; turned slightly to PR; in leather case with push-button closure embossed with fruit, flowers and scrolls on front and back and velvet with floral design opposite image
creditline: Gift of Richard Rudisill in honor of Virginia Moe
